properties.title: Coral Recovery Hope Spot
properties.description: Community divers monitor coral bleaching and support reef restoration with coral gardening and heat-tolerant nurseries. Story circles share local knowledge and tourism impacts.

properties.title: Kelp Forest Guardians
properties.description: A youth-led team maps kelp canopy extent and organizes shoreline cleanups. The program pairs citizen science transects with underwater photography.

properties.title: Seagrass Carbon Sanctuary
properties.description: Students partner with fishers to protect seagrass meadows and measure blue-carbon potential. Seasonal surveys document biodiversity and water clarity.

properties.title: Plastic-Free Bay Hope Spot
properties.description: A coalition reduces plastic leakage at the source with refill stations, school challenges, and river boom interception. Collected plastics are catalogued and upcycled.

properties.title: Open-Ocean Migration Corridor
properties.description: Youth researchers visualize whale and turtle migration routes and advocate for safer shipping lanes. The Hope Spot highlights science-to-policy collaboration.

properties.title: Cold-Water Reef Refuge
properties.description: A coastal community documents cold-water reef habitats and builds a local archive of underwater imagery to support marine protected area planning.
